title: In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Warnambool veterans]
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Army
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
abstract: Ten stories from and four interviews with Victorian veterans based in Port Fairy and Warnambool.
description: Fourteen veterans tell their stories, from the Australian Army, the Royal Australian Navy, and the Royal Australian Air Force. They share their memories from World War II, the Korean and Vietnam Wars and from the Australian home front. Ten stories from and four interviews with Victorian veterans based in Port Fairy and Warnambool.
